mi:PackageInformation.name: Orckestra.Web.Html.Jumbotron
mi:PackageInformation.author: Orckestra
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: The Jumbotron Slides function uses Cycle2 JQuery Plugin
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Show Jumbotron or Jumbotron Slides page blocks.
